My name is Christopher Lewis. I’m 23 years old and currently living in Melbourne, Australia.

By day I study law at the University of Melbourne. Before this I completed an undergraduate degree in computer science. I’ve also worked in a number of positions related to public policy, law and technology. To find out more about my professional and academic experience, click here.

I’m interested in programming, startups, technology, law, politics and history.

I see this blog as a place to show some of my past work and talk about various things that interest me.
